BetterEmergencyRetreat.name: <c=60ba67>PAWSAI</c>: Better Retreat Estimation
BetterEmergencyRetreat.desc:
<c=white>Default: TRUE</c>
Increases accuracy of PAWSAI's <c=card>Emergency Retreat</c> movement, allowing you to park your ship in the middle of the enemy's ship if there's sufficient room in the middle.
<c=keyword>Has <c=faint>little impact</c> on performance.</c>

BetterHyperdrive.name: <c=764535>Bruno</c>: Fancier Hyperdrive
BetterHyperdrive.desc:
<c=white>Default: FALSE</c>
Allows additional computations which are needed to more accurately show the damage on text cards. <c=faint>Also correctly calculates self-attacks?</c>
<c=keyword>Has <c=redd>significant impact</c> on performance.</c>

character.name: PAWSAI
character.desc:
<c=60ba67>PAWSAI</c>
An agile defense support machine. Its cards provide sufficient <c=keyword>tanking</c> as well as <c=keyword>situational movement</c>.

Repulsion.name: Repulsion Mod
Repulsion.desc:
When shot while shield is active, the hit is bounced back as a {0} damage attack.
<c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of next turn.</c>

Repetition.name: Repetition
Repetition.desc:
The next {0} cards' actions are played again.
<c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of next turn, or on activation.</c>
<c=keyword>Actions that give <c=status>REPETITION</c> is ignored.</c>

Regeneration.name: Shield Regen
Regeneration.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c> <c=downside>and decrease this by 1</c>.

PivotIn.name: Pivot Inward
PivotIn.title: PIVOT INWARD
PivotIn.desc:
Move both ships {0} spaces toward each other.
If centered, <c=downside>does nothing</c>.

PivotOut.name: Pivot Outward
PivotOut.title: PIVOT OUTWARD
PivotOut.desc:
Move both ships {0} spaces away from each other.
If centered, pick a random direction to move away from each other.

MirrorMoveLeft.name: Mirror Move Left
MirrorMoveLeft.title: MIRROR MOVE LEFT
MirrorMoveLeft.desc: Instantly move both ships {0} spaces to the <c=keyword>LEFT</c>.

MirrorMoveRight.name: Mirror Move Right
MirrorMoveRight.title: MIRROR MOVE RIGHT
MirrorMoveRight.desc: Instantly move both ships {0} spaces to the <c=keyword>RIGHT</c>.

MirrorMoveRandom.name: Mirror Move Random
MirrorMoveRandom.title: MIRROR MOVE RANDOM
MirrorMoveRandom.desc: Instantly move both ships {0} spaces in an equally <c=keyword>random</c> direction.

pawnchor.name: Paw Anchor
pawnchor.desc:
When pivoting, move based on this anchor as origin instead of the point between two ships.
<c=keyword>If multiple <c=midrow>Paw Anchors</c> exist in the field, only respect the youngest.</c>

OffensiveDefense.name: OFFENSIVE DEFENSE
OffensiveDefense.desc:
Insert an Attack at the top of every <c=60ba67>PAWSAI</c> card, with <c=keyword>fixed</c> damage based on <c=keyword>card cost</c>.
<c=keyword>Fixed damage is not affected by any status, but can be affected by part traits.</c>

ManyConsequences.name: MANY CONSEQUENCES
ManyConsequences.desc:
Permanently gain <c=keyword>+5 max shield</c> on pickup.
<c=downside>At the start of every combat, if you have more hull than max shield, take 1 hull damage.</c>

PowerPrep.name: POWER PREP
PowerPrep.desc: At the start of each combat, gain 1 <c=status>REPETITION</c>.

DelayedStart.name: DELAYED START
DelayedStart.desc: At the end of the first turn in combat, double all of your statuses.

PainCruiser.name: PAIN CRUISER
PainCruiser.desc: Whenever you take more than 3 damage per hit, gain 1 <c=status>PAYBACK</c>.

EmergencyRetreat.name: Emergency Retreat
EmergencyRetreat.desc:
Move <c=keyword>{{direction}}</c> until you don't overlap with enemy.
<c=keyword>End turn.</c>
EmergencyRetreat.descB:
Move <c=keyword>{{direction}}</c> until you don't overlap with foe.
<c=downside><c=status>EVADE</c> = 0</c>
<c=keyword>End turn.</c>

SmartAlignment.name: Smart Alignment
SmartAlignment.desc: Line up your <c=keyword>{{direction}}-most</c> cannon to closest foe<c=keyword>{{part}}</c> part.

Ultimatomatic.name: Ultimato-matic
Ultimatomatic.descB:
X=Missing Shield
<c=action>2X({{amount}}) <c=redd>{{attack}}</c>{{stun}} Pierce Atk</c>
<c=downside>-X Max Shield</c>

character.name: Bruno
character.desc:
<c=764535>BRUNO</c>
An artillery expert. His cards hit <c=keyword>hard</c>, but require some <c=downside>setting up and cooling down</c>.

Recoil.name: Recoil
Recoil.desc:
Your attacks <c=downside>deal no damage</c>.
<c=downside>Always goes away at start of next turn.</c>

Hyperdrive.name: Hyperdrive
Hyperdrive.desc:
Your next attack deals {0} additional damage.
<c=downside>Goes away on use.</c>

Mitigate.name: Mitigate
Mitigate.desc:
Reduce up to {0} incoming damage and gain equal amount as <c=status>SLOW BURN</c>.
<c=downside>Goes away at start of next turn.</c>

SlowBurn.name: Slow Burn
SlowBurn.desc:
Take 1 damage whenever you lose 1 <c=status>SLOW BURN</c>.
<c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of next turn.</c>

Hamper.name: Hamper
Hamper.desc:
Your attacks do at most <c=downside>1</c> damage.
<c=downside>Always goes away at start of next turn.</c>

HeavyAttack.name: Heavy Attack
HeavyAttack.title: HEAVY ATTACK
HeavyAttack.desc:
Fire a {0} damage shot from your <c=part>cannon</c>.
<c=keyword>Damage increase from statuses and artifacts is doubled.</c>
<c=downside>Gain 1 <c=status>RECOIL</c>.</c>

HeavyAttackPiercing.name: Heavy Attack Piercing
HeavyAttackPiercing.title: PIERCING HEAVY ATTACK
HeavyAttackPiercing.desc:
Fire a piercing {0} damage shot from your <c=part>cannon</c> that ignores all shields and armor.
<c=keyword>Damage increase from statuses and artifacts is doubled.</c>
<c=downside>Gain 1 <c=status>RECOIL</c>.</c>

BreachAttack.name: Breach Attack
BreachAttack.title: BREACH ATTACK
BreachAttack.desc:
Fire a {0} damage shot from your <c=part>cannon</c>.
<c=keyword>Damage is doubled on shielded targets.</c>
<c=downside>Gain 1 <c=status>RECOIL</c>.</c>

BreachAttackPiercing.name: Breach Attack Piercing
BreachAttackPiercing.title: PIERCING BREACH ATTACK
BreachAttackPiercing.desc:
Fire a piercing {0} damage shot from your <c=part>cannon</c> that ignores all shields and armor.
<c=keyword>Damage is doubled on shielded targets.</c>
<c=downside>Gain 1 <c=status>RECOIL</c>.</c>

UnfairAdvantage.name: UNFAIR ADVANTAGE
UnfairAdvantage.desc: Once per combat, when you deplete enemy shields, cancel all intents.

DoubleEdgedCannon.name: DOUBLE-EDGED CANNON
DoubleEdgedCannon.desc:
Your attacks deal double hull damage.
<c=downside>You take double hull damage from attacks</c>.

OverwhelmingStrike.name: OVERWHELMING STRIKE
OverwhelmingStrike.desc: If your attack does <c=keyword>5 or more</c> damage after status and artifact damage boosts, it ignores armor.

DeepClean.name: Deep Clean
DeepClean.descA:
X = Hand
Y = <c=energy>Energy</c>
X <c=status>MITIGATE</c>
Y <c=status>HYPERDRV</c>
<c=keyword>Destroy all cards in hand</c>
DeepClean.desc:
X = Hand
Y = <c=energy>Energy</c>
X <c=status>MITIGATE</c>
Y <c=status>HYPERDRV</c>
<c=keyword>Exhaust all cards in hand</c>

character.name: Kodijen
character.desc:
<c=e4b83e>KODIJEN</c>
A battle drone expert. His cards command large <c=keyword>automated drones</c> that he built himself.

HullCapacity.name: Hull Capacity
HullCapacity.desc:
<c=hull>Max hull</c> is raised by {0} for the rest of combat. Also temporarily gives {0} hull, which is deducted at the end of combat.
<c=keyword>If you have less hull than deductible, <c=downside>lose all but 1 hull</c>.</c>

BorrowedHull.name: Borrowed Hull
BorrowedHull.desc:
<c=hull>Hull</c> and <c=hull>max hull</c> is reduced by {0} for the rest of combat.
At the end of combat, <c=keyword>regain borrowed hull and max hull</c>.

MissileField.name: Missile Field
MissileField.title: MISSILE FIELD
MissileField.desc: Instantly turn every <c=midrow>object in the midrow</c> into <c=drone>missiles</c>.

SmartDrone.name: SMART DRONE
SmartDrone.desc:
Moves up to <c=keyword>{{move}}</c> towards enemy (if possible) and shoots a <c=damage>{{damage}}</c> shot once per turn.
Borrows {{hull}} <c=hull>hull</c>.

MissileDrone.name: MISSILE DRONE
MissileDrone.desc:
Fires a <c=drone>missile</c> every turn until it runs out.
Starts with <c=keyword>3</c> <c=drone>{{starter}}</c>; Max missile capacity: <c=keyword>{{capacity}}</c>.
Launching a <c=drone>missile</c> into the drone refills the magazine with up to two additional <c=drone>missiles</c>.
Borrows {{hull}} <c=hull>hull</c>.

MiniatureArtemis.name: MINIATURE ARTEMIS
MiniatureArtemis.desc:
Every turn, regains up to <c=status>{{shield}}</c> <c=status>SHIELD</c>, moves up to <c=action>{{evade}}</c> spaces, and attacks for <c=damage>{{damage}}</c> up to <c=keyword>{{attack}}</c> times.
Fully autonomous.
Borrows {{hull}} <c=hull>hull</c>.
<c=faint>A functional miniature version of the sleekest ship model in interstellar history!</c>

FirstOnesFree.name: FIRST ONE'S FREE
FirstOnesFree.desc: Once per combat, spawning a <c=e4b83e>Kodijen</c> <c=midrow>drone</c> that borrows hull will in fact not reduce ship hull.

SelfRepairingPlaster.name: SELF-REPAIRING PLASTER
SelfRepairingPlaster.desc: If you end combat with more than 4 <c=status>HULL CAPACITY</c>, <c=healing>heal 1</c>.

BattleDroneBoast.name: BATTLE-DRONE KING BOAST
BattleDroneBoast.desc:
Gain 2 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn if your hull is at max.
<c=downside>Lose 1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn if your hull is below <c=keyword>{{difficulty}}%</c>.</c>

UngodlyAmountOfControl.name: UNGODLY AMOUNT OF CONTROL
UngodlyAmountOfControl.desc:
At the start of every turn, gain 2 <c=status>DRONE SHIFT</c> and 1 <c=status>ENGINE STALL</c>.
If you have any <c=status>DRONE SHIFT</c> by the end of your turn, <c=downside>gain 1 additional <c=status>ENGINE STALL</c> next turn</c>.

ModelRocketDegree.name: MODEL ROCKET DEGREE
ModelRocketDegree.desc: +2 <c=drone>missile</c> damage dealt to enemy. <c=downside>-1 attack damage.</c>

WaitHoldUp.name: Wait Hold Up
WaitHoldUp.desc:
On draw, cancel all enemy intents.
<c=downside>End turn.</c>

AutoSignal.name: Auto-Signal
AutoSignal.desc: On draw, all <c=midrow>midrow objects</c> take a turn.

SuperGuard.name: Super Guard
SuperGuard.desc: For every <c=midrow>midrow object</c> that overlaps {{what}} ship, gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

SuperClear.name: Super Clear
SuperClear.desc: Destroy every <c=midrow>midrow object</c> that doesn't overlap with <c=keyword>{{ship}}</c> ship.

character.name: Parmesan
character.desc:
<c=2a767d>PARMESAN</c>
A sneaky deviant. Their cards focus on <c=keyword>evasion</c> and <c=keyword>sneak attacks</c>.

character.name: Varrigradona
character.desc:
<c=7b3258>VARRIGRADONA</c>
A freelancer. Her cards <c=keyword>manipulate</c> other cards by <c=keyword>holding onto them</c> until you need it, either for dependency or power.
